alert.note: Alert for Greensville; Isle of Wight; Southampton; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 8:46PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Showers with brief gusty winds will impact portions of north central Greensville, southwestern Isle of Wight, Southampton and southern Sussex Counties and the City of Franklin through 945 PM EDT... At 845 PM EDT, Doppler radar showers centered near Jarratt, or near Purdy, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jarratt and Stony Creek around 850 PM EDT. Courtland and Newsoms around 920 PM EDT. Sedley around 925 PM EDT. Franklin and Hunterdale around 930 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Vicksville, Adams Grove, Grizzard, Booker, Yale, Lumberton, Worrell, Cowie Corner, Hilda and Dory. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Greensville; Isle of Wight; Southampton; Sussex
